headline.print_headline: Alaska to Sue for Road Through Wildlife Refuge
headline.main: Alaska to Sue for Road Through Wildlife Refuge

docs.snippet: The state of Alaska announced Monday it will sue the federal government to open a road through a national wildlife refuge so that residents of a village will have improved access for emergency flights at an all-weather airport....
docs.lead_paragraph: The state of Alaska announced Monday it will sue the federal government to open a road through a national wildlife refuge so that residents of a village will have improved access for emergency flights at an all-weather airport.

headline.print_headline: A's Ruin Home Opener for Twins With 8-3 Victory
headline.main: A's Ruin Home Opener for Twins With 8-3 Victory

docs.snippet: Yoenis Cespedes proved he can play through a hurting right heel, giving Scott Kazmir and the Oakland Athletics a spark with a pair of RBIs that helped spoil the Minnesota Twins' home opener with an 8-3 victory on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Yoenis Cespedes proved he can play through a hurting right heel, giving Scott Kazmir and the Oakland Athletics a spark with a pair of RBIs that helped spoil the Minnesota Twins' home opener with an 8-3 victory on Monday.

headline.sub: Rwanda marks 20th anniversary of genocide with vigil
